locations: New York City, New York, USA
imdb.plot outline: In this documentary web series, German filmmaker David Steinberger, follows a handful of New York City's residents as they lead him to places significant to their lives and their stories. During their journey through the city, the individuals at the center of each episode provide the filmmaker with an intimate glance into their lives, capturing moving and intense portrayals of the people and the city itself.
imdb.title: My Few Lives
plot: In this documentary web series, German filmmaker David Steinberger, follows a handful of New York City's residents as they lead him to places significant to their lives and their stories. During their journey through the city, the individuals at the center of each episode provide the filmmaker with an intimate glance into their lives, capturing moving and intense portrayals of the people and the city itself.
